import React, { Component} from 'react' import {Col, ListGroup, Row, Badge} from 'react-bootstrap' import { numberWithCommas } from '../utils/utils' import TotalBayar from './TotalBayar' export default class Hasil extends Component { render() { const {keranjangs} = this.props return (

Keranjang

{keranjangs.length !== 0 && ( {keranjangs.map((menuKeranjang) => {menuKeranjang.jumlah}

{menuKeranjang.product.nama_barang}

Rp. {numberWithCommas(menuKeranjang.product.harga)}

{numberWithCommas(menuKeranjang.total_harga)}

 )} )} ) } }
